grails.spring
[Groovy] Class DynamicElementReader

java.lang.Object
  groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      grails.spring.DynamicElementReader

class DynamicElementReader
extends groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport

Used by BeanBuilder to read a Spring namespace expression in the Groovy DSL.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
See Also:
BeanBuilder
Since:
1.1
